titles.title: To amend part A of title XI of the Social Security Act to prohibit certain misuses of the Social Security account number.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 6/6/1996--Introduced. Amends part A of title XI of the Social Security Act to prohibit: (1) using social security account numbers without the holder's written consent; or (2) requiring disclosure by another person of a person's social security number as a condition of doing business. Outlines enforcement procedures and provides civil penalties.
